forkee.name: simdjson
forkee.description: Parsing gigabytes of JSON per second : used by Facebook/Meta Velox, WatermelonDB, Apache Doris, StarRocks

release.name: Version 3.4.0
release.body:
## What's Changed
* add a total order for elements by @mmomtchev in https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/pull/2072
* This provides verbose static_assert messages by @lemire in https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/pull/2074
* Adding the ability to write directly to an std::string.  by @lemire in https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/pull/2075
* Automating string reallocation when it is possible by @lemire in https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/pull/2076

## New Contributors
* @mmomtchev made their first contribution in https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/pull/2072

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/simdjson/simdjson/compare/v3.3.0...v3.4.0
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

  • add a total order for elements by @mmomtchev in #2072
  • This provides verbose static_assert messages by @lemire in #2074
  • Adding the ability to write directly to an std::string. by @le…
